parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~86912~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
